Notes: A mole enemy that moves on a set path. The player takes damage by touching it. It can be stunned by Ground Pounding nearby which makes it vulnerable to Spin Attacks. However, it can be defeated with any player attacks, such as fireballs and Koopa Shells.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 5.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.
